amendment.description: An amendment to provide a 5 year time-limit for the bill to remain in effect, afterwhich, Congress would be required to reauthorize the provisions. (Text of the amendment was printed as amendment No. 4 in the Congressional Record of January 31, 1995.).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kanjorski amendment (A012) Failed by recorded vote: 153 - 258 (Roll no. 88).
